text: Denílson is a Portuguese given name. Among people with this name are: ==Football== *Denílson (footballer, 1943-2024), Denílson Custódio Machado, attacking midfielder *Denilson (footballer, born 1972), Denilson Antonio Paludo, midfielder *Denílson (footballer, born 1976), Denílson Martins Nascimento, striker *Denílson (footballer, born 1977), Denílson de Oliveira Araújo, forward, former Real Betis player and Brazil international *Denílson (footballer, born 1988), Denílson Pereira Neves, midfielder, former São Paulo and Arsenal player *Denílson (footballer, born 1995), Denílson Pereira Júnior, striker *Denilson (footballer, born 2001), Denilson Alves Borges, Brazilian footballer *Denilson Costa (born 1968), Brazilian-born Honduras international and forward *Denílson Gabionetta (born 1985), winger ==Other== *Denílson Lourenço (born 1977), Brazilian judoka
title: Denílson
